title: Open Channel Management - Spillway
description: This entity contains a harmonised desctiption for a generic Spillway made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain. Spillway represents a junction-type object, controlling the release of water from a dam or regulation structure downstream.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be Spillway.

spillwayType.description: Property. The type of the spillway. In the case of “Specified Spillway”, only “Elevation – discharge” curve is required. Enum:'Broad-Crested, Ogee, Sharp-Crested, Specified Spillway'.

crestElevation.description: Property. The crest elevation of the Spillway. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'. Units:'meters'.

crestLength.description: Property. The length of the Spillway equals to the total length through which water passes. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'. Units:'meters'.

spillwayWidth.description: Property. The width of the spillway (m). Only for 'Broad-Crested' type. Units:'meters'.

numberAbutments.description: Property. The number of abutments of an ogee spillway. Only for 'Ogee' type.

apronElevation.description: Property. The elevation at the bottom of the ogee spillway structure (P), just upstream of the spillway.

apronLength.description: Property. The total length of the spillway bottom. Units:'meters'

dischargeCoefficient.description: Property. The discharge coefficient for energy losses as water enters, flows amnd exits the spillway. Units:'m^0.5/s'.

designHead.description: Property. The total upstream energy head for which the spillway is designed (Ho) for 'Ogee Spillway'. Units:'meters'.

designDischarge.description: Property. The design discharge (Qo) of the Spillway. Units: 'm^3/s'.

designDischargeCoefficient.description: Property. The discharge coefficient (Co) for energy losses for the design discharge (Ho).

maxFloodElevation.description: Property. The maximum elevation of water that can pass the spillway.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

controlCrossSection.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of an entity of type Cross Section, indicating the cross section that controls the flow over the Spillway.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

curveElevationDischarge.description: Relationship. The URI of an OpenChannelCurve entity that represents discharge (Q) as a function of water elevation (H).

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

curveDischargeCoefficient.description: Relationship. The URI of an OpenChannelCurve entity that represents the discharge coefficient (C) as a function of upstream head (H) and spillway geometry. For instance, discharge coefficient as a function of upstream head over spillway width (C ~ H/L), or C/Co ~ H/Ho.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

curveDesignDischargeCoefficient.description: Relationship. The URI of an OpenChannelCurve entity that represents the design discharge coefficient (Co) as a function of apron Elevation over design upstream head (Co ~ P/Ho).
